nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Patchy blowing snow before 3am, then patchy blowing snow and a slight chance of snow. Mostly cloudy. Low around 7, with temperatures rising to around 21 overnight. Northwest wind 20 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 37 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.shortForecast: Patchy Blowing Snow then Chance Light Snow And Patchy Blowing Snow
nws.detailedForecast: Patchy blowing snow before 7am, then patchy blowing snow and a slight chance of snow between 7am and 8am, then a chance of snow and patchy blowing snow. Mostly cloudy. High near 23, with temperatures falling to around 8 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 23 to 31 mph, with gusts as high as 43 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around -3. Wind chill values as low as -19. Northwest wind 10 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

nws.name: M.L. King Jr. Day
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 12. Wind chill values as low as -18. Northwest wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.
